For online tea shops, I have a few recommendations that offer a wide selection of green teas:

1. **Adagio Teas**: Adagio has an impressive collection of green teas from around the world, including Japan, China, and Korea. They offer a variety of single-origin teas, blends, and even a "Tea of the Month" subscription.
2. **The Tea Spot**: This online shop has a vast selection of organic and fair-trade teas, including many green tea options. They also offer tea samplers and a "Tea of the Month" club.
3. **Harney & Sons**: Harney & Sons is a well-known tea company with a wide range of high-quality green teas. They source their teas from top estates around the world and offer a variety of blends and single-origin teas.
4. **Ippodo Tea Co.**: Ippodo is a Japanese tea company that offers a wide selection of premium green teas, including Matcha, Sencha, and Gyokuro. They're known for their high-quality teas and traditional production methods.
5. **The Republic of Tea**: This online shop has a large collection of green teas from various regions, including Japan, China, and India. They also offer tea accessories and gifts.

These online shops often provide detailed descriptions of their teas, including flavor profiles, brewing instructions, and customer reviews. You can also reach out to their customer service teams for recommendations or advice.

Before making a purchase, you might want to check out each shop's shipping policies, as they may vary. Some shops offer free shipping on orders over a certain amount or have loyalty programs that can help you save money.

Happy tea exploring!
